interested in software studies, philosophy of information, complex socio-technical systems, semiotics.

this blog makes up a palette of looseleaf writing snippets - little blocks of writings on topics i find illumining. sometimes ordered, mostly not. weaving together convergences across humanities, critical theory and computer science.

About Me

Currently, I work at a Singaporean government agency dealing with thought leadership and policy directions for human and machine collaboration systems. Along the way, I also dabble in research for 5G cybersecurity and blockchain consortia governance. With a media studies and social science background, I seek to unearth interplays between these fields and cohere multiple research inquiries.

Other times, I'm in charge of marketing & partnerships at CodingGirls SG.

My other interests include: consciousness & intelligence, AI/machine ethics, theoretical physics, ecocriticism, creative coding & computational creativity.

talk to me at vanessaauraphin@gmail.com
